REGULAR.description:
With Mikado defeated, Seventh Flame readies for their next big challenge: defeating the Seven Shadows.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Oretachi wa, Saikyou ni Idomu!
We Challenge the Strongest!
俺達は, 最強に挑む!

REGULAR.description:
The gang begins their battles in the mysterious Shadow Area, with the promise that if they can defeat the Seven Shadows, all will be revealed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Accept Your Challenge!
Sono Shiren, Ukete Tatsu!
その試練, 受けて立つ!

REGULAR.description:
The first battle in the Shadow Area begins as Mikado faces off against Hiro and his secret Portalcraft deck.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sorekoso ga, Kimi no Yowasa Da
That`s Your Weakness
それこそが, 君の弱さだ

REGULAR.description:
Hiro puts his plan into action. His goal: to help Mikado enjoy Shadowverse!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ll Make It a Defeat That Means Something!
Kachi Aru Haiboku ni Kaete Yaru!
価値ある敗北に変えてやる!

REGULAR.description:
Tsubasa challenges the secretive Shadowcraft member of the Seven Shadows, whose identity is a mystery.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Not Just Despair, Right?
Zetsubou dake ja Nakunai Desuka
絶望だけじゃなくないですか

REGULAR.description:
Tsubasa`s battle with the Shadowcraft member of the Seven Shadows reaches its conclusion as she plays her most powerful cards and combos. Will it be enough to bring down the greatest Shadowcraft player in the world?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Neither I, Nor the World, Will Change
Watashi mo Sekai mo, Kawari wa Shinai
私も世界も, 変わりはしない

REGULAR.description:
Ryoga begins his battle against Wolfram. Can his superior rhythm defeat the master of equality?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Destined to Disappear Before the Light
Hikari no Mae de Kieru ga Sadame
光の前で消えるがさだめ

REGULAR.description:
Ryoga continues his duel with Wolfram. Wolfram has declared that Ryoga is worthless and beyond salvation. Is he right?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`m Taking You with Me to the Pits of Hell
Jigoku no Hate ni Michizure Da
地獄の果てに道連れだ

REGULAR.description:
It`s Hero Swordcraft vs. Villain Forestcraft once more as Ren faces Hina, the latest of the Seven Shadows.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Amasa mo Sugireba Mune ga Yakeruze
If It`s Too Sweet, It Gives You Heartburn
甘さも過ぎれば胸がやけるぜ

REGULAR.description:
Ren`s battle with the villainous Hina comes to an end, as both players show off an array of powerful new cards.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aku no Bigaku ni Oborete Kiero!
Drown in the Aesthetics of Evil!
悪の美学に溺れて消えろっ!

REGULAR.description:
After years of estrangement, Subaru goes to face his younger brother once more.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ve Decided I`m Not Running Anymore!
Mou Nigeneette, Sou Kimeta!
もう逃げねぇって, そう決めた!

REGULAR.description:
Subaru reaches the conclusion of his battle with his younger brother. Can the brothers be reunited once more?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hakaba no Soko kara Yomigaettaze, Ore wa!
I`m Back from the Graveyard!
墓場の底から蘇ったぜ, 俺は!

REGULAR.description:
The mysterious Arc Ruler lurks in the shadows as Shion prepares to battle Wodin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shinpan no Toki wa, Chikai
The Hour of Judgment Is Nigh
審判の時は, 近い

REGULAR.description:
Shion battles Wodin, the most solitary member of the Seven Shadows. Will she succumb to the temptation to walk the forbidden path alone, or stay with her friends in Seventh Flame?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kinki ni sae Fumikomeru
Penetrate Even the Most Forbidden Secrets
禁忌にさえ踏み込める

REGULAR.description:
Shion finishes her battle with Wodin Kraft. Will she make the choice he wants her to make, or will she find her own path to follow?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kinki Kindan Osoruru ni Tarazu!
The Forbidden Is Nothing to Fear!
禁忌禁断おそるるに足らず!

REGULAR.description:
Itsuki battles Luca, the legendary Bloodcraft player who fought to save the world. Luca`s lost his interest in the game, and Itsuki hopes to reignite his passion.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Boku no Zenbu de Anata ni Idomimasu!
I`ll Challenge You with All I`ve Got!
僕の全部で貴方に挑みます!

REGULAR.description:
Itsuki has succeeded in reigniting Luca`s passion. Can he withstand the full force of one of the greatest Shadowverse players ever to exist?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Boku no Genkai no, Sono Saki Desu!
What Lies Beyond My Limits!
僕の限界の, その先ですっ!

REGULAR.description:
With only one more loss before Seventh Flame is defeated, Itsuki decides to turn the battle over to a badly shaken Mikado.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Farewell, Mikado Shirogane
Sayounara Da, Shirogane Mikado
さようならだ, 白銀ミカド

REGULAR.description:
Mikado is on the verge of losing to Luca, the legendary Bloodcraft player. Can he find the strength within to keep going?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kimi wa Kimi no Shadowver no Imi o Shiru
You Will Learn the Meaning of Your Own Shadowverse
君は君のシャドバの意味を知る

REGULAR.description:
It`s finally time for Light to battle Hiro. The battle with the greatest Shadowverse player is about to begin...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Boku no Naka no Hikari to Yami o, Anata ni Butsukeru!
I`ll Strike You with the Light and Darkness Within Me!
僕の中の光と闇を, あなたにぶつける!

REGULAR.description:
The final battle against the Seven Shadows has begun, and the final opponent has a question for Hiro: "What is Shadowverse to you?"
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Like Is the Strongest Feeling!
Sukitte Kimochi wa, Saikyou Da!
好きって気持ちは, 最強だ!

REGULAR.description:
Light`s battle with Hiro, the strongest Shadowverse player, continues. Can Lævateinn Dragon match up to the power of the champ`s best card?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Oretachi no Battle wa Koko kara Da!
Our Battle Is Just Getting Started!
俺達のバトルはここからだ!

REGULAR.description:
The battle with the Seven Shadows comes to a conclusion just as a powerful new threat reveals itself...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ll Put All My Feelings into This Draw!
Omoi o Zenbu, Draw ni Noseru!
想いを全部, ドローに乗せる!

REGULAR.description:
The DigiFriends have gone out of control and are attacking people, and the students of Shadowverse Battle College are trapped on campus. They`ll have to work together if they want to survive the onslaught.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ll Save Everyone!
Ore wa Minna o Tasukemasu!
俺はみんなを助けます!

REGULAR.description:
With the countdown to Earth`s destruction drawing closer, Shion has a plan to save the day and defeat Arc Ruler.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kono Chikara de, Sekai o Sukuou
Let`s Save the World with This Power
この力で, 世界を救おう

SPECIAL.description:
Light and some of the gang are joined by Hiro, Luca, and a few familiar old faces as they take a look back at Seventh Flame`s battles with the Seven Shadows in Genesis Corp`s experimental facility, the Shadow Area.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Special Episode 3
Tokubetsu Hen 3
特別編3
Shadowverse Flame: Seven Shadows Hen
Shadowverse Flame: Seven Shadows Arc
シャドウバースFLAME セブンシャドウズ編
shadoba s3
